snippet.title: Paris Transylvania - A Pachinko Roguelike Deckbuilder 🖤
snippet.description:
We are now 6 months into development, and things are improving rapidly every day! Best of all, it's seriously fun to play! 

Paris Transylvania combines the mechanics of Peglin and Slay The Spire, but with a fresh twist in both format and gameplay. Navigate Transylvania freely, collect assets, and battle bizarre creatures and the wicked vampires that rule this place.

Join the open development on Discord: https://discord.gg/mPAVusQNwf
Play the alpha for FREE: https://magneticlake.itch.io/paris-transylvania 
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2459560
